sentences.en: ‘I think he’ll agree to it.’ ‘ That will be a first .’
sentences.cn: “我想他会同意的。”“那倒是破天荒头一遭。”

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: at first Hugo tried to be patient.
sentences.cn: 开始，雨果还想耐心一点。

sentences.en: Bob Marley provided them with their first taste of Reggae music.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃·马利让他们首次接触到了雷盖音乐。

sentences.en: Delhi was first and foremost a barracks town.
sentences.cn: 德里首先是、也主要是一座军营城。

sentences.en: Ella was his first girlfriend.
sentences.cn: 埃拉是他的首任女友。

sentences.en: English has hurt me a thousand times, but I still regard it as my first love.
sentences.cn: 英语伤我千百遍，我待英语如初恋。

sentences.en: First I had to decide what to wear.
sentences.cn: 首先我得决定穿什么。

sentences.en: first of all, let me ask you something.
sentences.cn: 首先，让我先问你点事情。

sentences.en: first off, I owe you a heck of an apology.
sentences.cn: 首先，我真的应该向你道个歉。

sentences.en: Half of PML's scientists have first degrees, the other half have PhDs.
sentences.cn: 普利茅斯海洋研究所的科学家一半有学士学位，另一半则有博士学位。

sentences.en: He walked towards the summerhouse, at first furtively, then with more confidence.
sentences.cn: 他朝凉亭走去，开始还偷偷摸摸地，后来就壮大了胆子。

sentences.en: I had a case of the jitters during my first two speeches.
sentences.cn: 我在最初两次讲演时感到非常紧张。

sentences.en: I have to meet Josh first thing tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我明天一大早就得去接乔西。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: I’ll join you in a minute but I need to make a phone call first.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿就来，但是我得先打个电话。

sentences.en: It all started so promisingly when Speed scored a tremendous first goal.
sentences.cn: 比赛开始的时候形势大好，斯皮德以一记精彩的进球拔得头筹。

sentences.en: It is better to stretch the tight muscles first.
sentences.cn: 最好先伸展一下僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.en: museums are first and last about curatorship.
sentences.cn: 博物馆的好坏从根本而言与其管理者有关。

sentences.en: She suggests you first assess your income and outgoings.
sentences.cn: 她建议你先估算一下自己的收入和开销。

sentences.en: Sylvia, camera in hand, asked, "Where do we go first?"
sentences.cn: 西尔维娅手里拿着相机问道：“我们先去哪里？”

sentences.en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentences.en: The first and last mountain I climbed was Mount Rundle (= it was the only mountain I ever climbed ) .
sentences.cn: 伦多山是我爬过的第一座山，也是最后一座。

sentences.en: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

sentences.en: The first plane-loads of food, children's clothing and medical supplies began arriving.
sentences.cn: 首批飞机运送的食物、儿童衣物和药品开始抵达。

sentences.en: These results are firsts in the history of women’s athletics.
sentences.cn: 这些成绩在女运动员历史上是第一次。

sentences.en: They occupied the first two floors of the tower.
sentences.cn: 他们占用了塔楼的头两层。

sentences.en: tickets are available on a first come, first served basis.
sentences.cn: 售票实行先来先售予的原则。

sentences.en: Why should they get first call on the best property?
sentences.cn: 凭什么最好的房产尽着他们先挑？

words.tran_cn: 首先（主要用于列举条目、论点时）；第一

phrases.tran_cn: 先到者先受款待（表示严格按先后次序办事）
（参赛者，尤指赛马）第一个到达终点
第一个季度；上弦月；上弦
第一阶段的；第一级的；第一期的

trans.tran_en: coming before all the other things or people in a series

trans.tran_cn: 首例，（英国大学的）优等学位
trans.tran_en: something that has never happened or been done before
something that has never happened or been done before
coming before all the other things or people in a series
